title: Filth
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Fuck it, the coon's well out the way underneath the earth and frost. The most important thing is that the roads are clearer, and I get out to Carrick Knowe in no time.

title: Ecstasy: Three Tales of Chemical Romance
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Drewsy and me are in this Gumleyland ghetto. Ah think it's Carrick Knowe but it could be Colinton Mains. Ah was fucked and hungover in the van.
